summary: Tired of trying to find your horse after a battle just to find it dead , get this one.
descriptionHtml:
I got so tired of my silly horse attacking everything and everyone only to die that I made this one. 
Based on the Shadowmere horse which u can only get by choosing the right path.

- Essential and can not die.
- Non-aggressive and will not attack unless attacked first.
- Brave and will not run away from it\'s \"parked\" location.
- Helps nobody and won\'t interfere with your fights.
- Some improved stats as it\'s based on the Shadowmere.

You will find this horse at Windelheim stables waiting for you after install.

Just drop it in your data dir or download with manager.
author: ALyckyFelix
